messages.message: For multi-doc, it's not immediately clear that clicking these buttons is doing anything unless you know to look at the chat bar. It would be helpful to see a visual cue that the document has been selected. Would also be nice to deselect from this as well
good feedback -- i have received similar feedback as well. cc @Varun Jain

One other thing I've noticed is that if I've already added files through the left hand bar above first. When I go into the selector modal, I'm actually able to add back the same files I already added.

It seems to keep track of the files have been added/removed from the modal itself rather than what has also been added from the left hand bar.
Thanks for the feedback! The second piece of feedback is a bug (if it happens consistently) and should not happen. @Aayush
Can't reproduce the second bug for duplicate file addition in aihub-sanbox, it should have been fixed with the recent bug fix pushes.
